remixlab.bias.event

Class ClickEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.bias.core.BogusEvent
      • remixlab.bias.event.ClickEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable

    public class ClickEvent
extends BogusEvent
    A click event encapsulates a ClickShortcut and it's defined by the number of clicks. A click event holds the position where the event occurred (x() and y()).

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class remixlab.bias.core.BogusEvent

        ALT, ALT_GRAPH, CTRL, META, NOMODIFIER_MASK, SHIFT

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClickEvent(float x, float y, int b)
      Constructs a single click ClickEvent at the given position and from the given button defining the events shortcut()
      ClickEvent(float x, float y, int b, int clicks)
      Constructs a ClickEvent at the given position, from the given button defining the events shortcut(), and with the given number of clicks.
      ClickEvent(float x, float y, int modifiers, int b, int clicks)
      Constructs a ClickEvent at the given position, from the given button and modifiers which defines the events shortcut(), and with the given number of clicks.
